about: Hi! I am Tyra Parring. I am an aspiring developer and my hunger for knowledge and determination to turn information into action has contributed to my success of being at Life Choices Academy today. I am a hard-working and driven individual who isn't afraid to face a challenge. I'm passionate about my work and I know how to get the job done. I would describe myself as an open and honest person who doesn't believe in misleading other people and tries to be fair in everything I do.
bio: I am Tyra Parring, a junior web developer passionate about creating dynamic web applications. I love exploring new technologies and continuously improving my skills. My journey in web development started at Life Choices Academy, where I honed my skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Vue.js.
welcomeMessage: Welcome to My Portfolio! Hi there! Iâ€™m Tyra Parring, an aspiring web developer dedicated to creating intuitive and visually appealing user experiences. Browse through my work to see how I blend design and technology to craft engaging digital solutions!

education.description: Completed my schooling career at Bonteheuwel High School.
Completed a Reading and Writing Tutoring Workshop under the Amy Biehl Foundation.

Joined a Coding Bootcamp program that provided the fundamentals of Web Development, including learning coding languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more. The program also focused on interpersonal and self-development skills to aid personal growth both in life and the work environment.

workExp.description: Completed a job shadowing programme at a contact centre promoting products to customers.

testimonials.name: Caitlin Dalwai
testimonials.message: Since meeting Tyra through, Life Choices Academy coding program, I have always admired her drive to figure things out. Whether it is problem-solving through code errors or even in life, she has a natural talent for it. She never lets down a challenge and continues to push herself to the best of her ability. Any company will be lucky to have her on their team. - Caitlin Dalwai

testimonials.name: Kayden Hendricks
testimonials.message: Working alongside Tyra has been an absolute pleasure. Her dedication, professionalism, and remarkable skills have truly made a difference in our team. Not only does she bring a wealth of expertise to the table, but her collaborative spirit and positive attitude also uplift the entire workplace. Tyra consistently goes above and beyond, demonstrating exceptional leadership and problem-solving abilities. She's not just a valuable asset; she's an inspiring role model for everyone around her. I feel fortunate to have had the opportunity to work with her, and I wholeheartedly recommend her to any team or project lucky enough to have her on board. - Kayden Hendricks

testimonials.name: Kiara Adams
testimonials.message: Tyra is the kind of person everyone wishes they had, she's not just a friend, she's a force of positivity and productivity. From the moment she steps into the room, Tyra radiates energy and enthusiasm for learning. What stands out most about Tyra is her incredible work ethic. She approaches every assignment with determination and diligence, always striving to produce her best work. No matter how challenging the task, Tyra tackles it head-on, demonstrating a remarkable ability to stay focused and organized even under pressure. - Kiara Adams

testimonials.name: Ntando Mabuto
testimonials.message: Tyra is very talented and always exceeds expectations. She is approachable which makes it easy to collaborate with. - Ntando Mabuto

testimonials.name: Matthew Brown
testimonials.message: Tyra is an extremely hard working individual. Her confidence really shows when working in groups. Her positive work ethic is a reflection of her character.

professionalSummary: I am a dedicated and enthusiastic web developer with experience in building dynamic websites and web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Vue.js. I am passionate about learning new technologies and continuously improving my skills.

funFacts.fact: I love solving puzzles and riddles.
I have a passion for cooking and often experiment with new recipes.
I enjoy hiking and exploring nature trails.
I'm an avid reader of fiction novels.
I have a knack for learning new languages and currently working on improving my Xhosa.
